name: Abandoned Dark
description:
Abandoned Dark - A story about a chick that accidentally ended up in the dark depths and now, in order to stop it, he needs to get to the surface. On his way he will meet many dangers and traps. Your main goal is to overcome everything that gets in your way and find the cherished way out.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You need to go through different levels along the way, destroying enemies in the location.

Left alone. You are ready to start your adventure and give battle to your enemies!

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics.
- Interesting levels.
- Good soundtrack
